sections.purpose: To mix high-viscosity liquids or large volumes using a motor-driven paddle.
sections.scope: Applicable to sample preparation in Pharmaceutical Analysis.
procedure: Secure the motor to a heavy-duty laboratory stand.
Attach the stirring shaft and impeller, ensuring they are tightened.
Lower the impeller into the center of the vessel.
Switch ON the motor and gradually increase the speed.
Observe the mixing and adjust for optimal flow.
Turn OFF the motor and raise the impeller before removing the vessel.
Clean the shaft and impeller with appropriate solvents.
Lubricate the moving parts of the stand as required.
precautions: Ensure the stirrer is properly grounded.
Do not wear loose clothing that could be caught in the shaft.
Check that all clamps are secure to prevent vibration.
Always increase speed gradually from zero.
Use a splash guard for hazardous chemical mixtures.
